data.name: Cyberhunt - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The CYBERHUNT Original Soundtrack is a collection of 6 awesome tracks (including 2 versions of each looped and complete) plus a intro track from the amazing brazilian composer Derek Volker!



All tracks are on MP3 format

  • Intro
  • 300x
  • Introspektiv Ventil
  • Excels
  • Voices From Below
  • Illumination
  • Access
  • 300x(looped)
  • Introspektiv Ventil(looped)
  • Excels(looped)
  • Voices From Below(looped)
  • Illumination(looped)
  • Access(looped)
